Class ManageHotelController

public class ManageHotelController extends Object implements ActionListener, DocumentListener
Controller for the management of hotels.

      mainGUI - - the GUI/View that contains all the GUIs for the program
      model - - the model which contains all the logic and processes that makes the program usable.

    • removeUpdate

      public void removeUpdate(DocumentEvent e)
      Gives notification that a portion of the document has been removed. The range is given in terms of what the view last saw (that is, before updating sticky positions).
      Specified by:
      removeUpdate in interface DocumentListener
      Parameters:
      e - the document event
